actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to convey any interest held by the United States in certain lands located in Bell County, Kentucky, to the Board of Education, Bell County, Kentucky.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to convey all right, title, and interest held by the United States in specified lands located in Bell County, Kentucky, to the Bell County Board of Education.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to convey any interest held by the United States in certain lands located in Bell County, Kentucky, to the Board of Education, Bell County, Kentucky.
